mapper.select:
select r.*,a.asset_name,a.acreage,a.address as assetAddress,a.status as assetStatus, l.lessee_name,l.phone,l.sex,l.identity_card,l.address as personAddress from rent_lease_info r join rent_asset a on a.id = r.asset_id join rent_lessee l on l.id = r.lessee_id
r.is_delete = 0
and a.asset_name like concat('%',#{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and l.lessee_name like concat('%',#{lesseeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and l.phone like concat('%',#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.address like concat('%',#{assetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and r.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from rent_lease_info where status = 1 and is_delete = 0 and DATE(pay_date) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY);
select * from rent_lease_info where status = 1 and is_delete = 0 and DATE(expire_date) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY);
